about_the_game:
HexaBEAT! is an exhilarating rhythm game that tests your timing and skill. In the game, you control a hexagon with three differently colored faces that moves in sync with the music beats. Each level presents progressively more challenging obstacles where you must synchronize your movements to the rhythm of the background music to advance successfully.

The goal is to maneuver the hexagon so that its movements perfectly align with the beats of the music playing in the background. This involves not only keeping the beat but also adapting to changes in speed and the complexity of movement patterns as you progress through the game.

As you advance, the difficulty ramps up, offering an addictive blend of dexterity and rhythm. Players need to stay focused and have quick reflexes to conquer each level, making HexaBEAT! a constant and thrilling challenge for those who enjoy games that blend music and physical skill.
- Create your own maps easily with just some data, no need for complex mapping.
- Compete against others to see who perfects a map the most
- Experience the new game mode, HexaTiles: a twist on the classic piano game where you need to control a circle to click in time with the notes.
